messages.content: I am a helpful assistant.
Why did the organization introduce GCP?

dx Global Infrastructure's goal is to enable dx teams in digital transformation projects by providing the best platform services and a certain degree of choice. To have an optimal mix of services, our own private cloud and two managed public cloud platforms are seen as key for this.
I am a helpful assistant.
Which cloud should I choose when I start new?
The Henkel dx preference for public cloud is on Google. The landing zone for GCP is the most advanced and also offers very competitive conditions to us.
I am a helpful assistant.
Can I get more permissions?

The permissions we assign you are in line with the Henkel Security Standard and Cloud Architecture design. If you need more permissions for a specific action, either the Cloud Architecture team can perform them on your behalf or elaborate to change the authorization concept.
I am a helpful assistant.
I received a notice on Security Alerts. What shall I do?

You are fully responsible for your Google Cloud Project. If you deviate from the Landing Zone recommendations, this might cause a security finding. In any case, you must remediate the Security Findings from Google Security Command Center. Please reach out to your Cloud Security contact for questions.
I am a helpful assistant.
Why can't I use service keys in the service account?
It is best practice to disallow service keys, as reality shows they are rarely rotated and long-living. Instead, use the Google Workload Identity Federation to obtain an STS token.
I am a helpful assistant.
How do I connect Azure DevOps/GitLab with GCP?
You need to use the OIDC auth token flow in conjunction with Google Secure Token Service and Workload Identity Federation feature.
I am a helpful assistant.
Which services are available?
Currently, we do not restrict any service on GCP. However, we will check the architectural design with you and guide you through services that are most suitable for your workload.
I am a helpful assistant.
How do I obtain and request access to GCP?
Please raise a request via the Cloud Portal and ensure budget codes are taken care of beforehand.
I am a helpful assistant.
How do you charge incurring costs?
Same as with all cloud services, Henkel pays them centrally (Corporate contract in Germany) and distributes costs to your IT products and implicitly to your cost center.
I am a helpful assistant.
How can I open support tickets?
You can open a support ticket on the top right of GCP. If you need special assistance, please also reach out to our Technical Account Manager.
I am a helpful assistant.
Can I onboard external partners?
For light access, you need to create a MyID Business Partner. For heavy and frequent usage, a Henkel external user is recommended.
I am a helpful assistant.
How do I define custom roles?
If your project know already which roles to use, we will create a GitLab project so you can describe your role as IAC and apply it to your project and the service accounts.
I am a helpful assistant.
How do I request a DNS entry on GCP?
We currently support *.gcp.henkelgroup.io for resolution. Provide the required details to get a DNS entry.
I am a helpful assistant.
How do backups work in GCP?
Currently, we are offering only GCE snapshots which allow for a restore. A more solid solution is being assessed.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is a sole-tenant node?
A physical Compute Engine server that is dedicated to hosting only your organization's/project's VMs.
I am a helpful assistant.
How can you keep your VMs physically separated from VMs in other projects?
By using sole-tenant nodes.
I am a helpful assistant.
What steps are involved in using the Node Group Factory for Sole Tenancy?
Creating a node group configuration, cloning the repository, creating a .yaml configuration file, creating a Merge Request on GitLab, and onboarding virtual machines.
I am a helpful assistant.
What should be considered as best practices when using node groups for VMs?

Limiting the number of node groups to avoid underutilized nodes, using autoscaling and CPU overcommit to decrease costs, separating workloads by environment, using appropriate host maintenance policies for constant uptime, and disabling CPU overcommit for performance-critical workloads.
I am a helpful assistant.
What information is required to start off with Google Cloud?
Budget information (Clarity Code), application asset information (Alfabet), and an architectural description of the solution.
I am a helpful assistant.
How do you request a Google Cloud project?
You request the project in the Cloud Portal and will be routed to the Hybrid Cloud (GCP) team.
I am a helpful assistant.
What do you need to provision after requesting a Google Cloud project?
You need to provision an Azure AD group and a shared mailbox for notifications.
I am a helpful assistant.
What tools can you use to develop and deploy applications on Google Cloud?
You can choose between using Azure DevOps or GitLab.
I am a helpful assistant.
What additional terms apply for POCs and time-limited sandboxes?

Additional terms include accepting cloud governance, staying updated with cloud landing zone governance, refraining from dependencies on team or business-related processes, applying cloud security refinements in a timely manner, and using the environment solely for learning and practicing.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the recommended way to access the GCP Landing Zone?
You need to use the provided link to access the GCP Landing Zone for Henkel.com (prod).
I am a helpful assistant.
How can Azure Backup be enabled for Virtual Machines and SQL Server on Azure VMs?
Azure Backup can be enabled by setting the locations in the config.json for the Landing Zone and configuring network integration in network.<env>.json.
I am a helpful assistant.
How can new resources in Azure Backup be registered?

New Virtual Machines and SQL Server on Virtual Machines should be registered within 60 minutes after provisioning. The registration can be checked through the Recovery Services Vault by selecting the Backup items.
I am a helpful assistant.
What resources are deployed when Azure Backup is enabled?

Resources deployed include a resource group per location, a Recovery Services Vault per location, Private Endpoint (when network integration is enabled), and resource groups for storing restore points.
I am a helpful assistant.
What are the default backup policies for Virtual Machines and SQL Databases?
Default backup policies include making a backup every 4 hours for Virtual Machines, a daily full backup for SQL Databases retained for 30 days, and hourly database log backups for 30 days.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the purpose of Azure Update Management Center?
The Azure Update Management Center is a patch orchestration system to ensure that Virtual Machines (VM) on Azure have the latest security updates installed.
I am a helpful assistant.
Which type of updates are automatically applied to Virtual Machines when on-boarded to Update Management Center?
Virtual Machines on Azure on-boarded to Update Management Center will automatically receive OS updates marked as Critical, Security, or Service Pack.
I am a helpful assistant.
What needs to be done by the owner of a Virtual Machine in terms of updating applications?
Applications installed by users are not updated by Update Management Center, thus the owner of the VM is expected to keep this software updated.
I am a helpful assistant.
What configuration options need to be set when setting up a new Virtual Machine in the Azure Portal?
When setting up a new Virtual Machine in the Azure Portal, make sure to set the Patch orchestration options to Azure-orchestrated within the Management section.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the default schedule for updates on Virtual Machines?
By default, virtual machines will follow a global update cycle where updates to the Operating System and built-in OS applications are installed every Sunday between 3 AM - 6 AM (CET time).
I am a helpful assistant.
How can custom update schedules be implemented for Virtual Machines?
Some virtual machines require a different update schedule than the default ones, for which custom schedules can be assigned by adding the MaintenanceSchedule tag to the virtual machine.
I am a helpful assistant.
How can a virtual machine receive an exemption to have updates installed using a custom schedule?

To receive an exemption for a virtual machine to receive updates using a custom schedule, an exemption must be granted by the Henkel Endpoint & Cloud Security team. This process involves providing specific information via email.
I am a helpful assistant.
How can one check if any updates are pending for a Virtual Machine?
The Azure Portal can be used to check if any updates are pending on a Virtual Machine by using the Updates blade.
I am a helpful assistant.
What does the Cloud Adoption team offer for Henkel businesses?
The Cloud Adoption team provides architectural guidance, infrastructure development, and full Cloud Engineering services for successful adoption of Azure Cloud.
I am a helpful assistant.
How can assistance from the Cloud Adoption team be requested?
Assistance from the Cloud Adoption team can be requested through the Henkel Hybrid Cloud Portal. A Cloud Adoption team member will reach out to schedule the first meeting.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the process of a typical Adoption project run by the Cloud Adoption team?
A typical Adoption project involves an initial meeting to discuss the scope, further design meetings, cost approval, development phase with Cloud engineers, project handover, and project wrap-up.
I am a helpful assistant.
How are the costs of a project with the Cloud Adoption team billed?

The cost of a project with the Cloud Adoption team is billed as time and material. The first meeting is not billed, but subsequent activities such as investigation, refinement of architecture, and development are billed based on an aligned budget.
I am a helpful assistant.
What environments are supported by Cloud Adoption labeled as?
Environments supported by Cloud Adoption are labeled as "BizDevOps Maintenance" and are under the operations responsibility of the App Owner or Requester.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the importance of providing an architecture diagram in Azure development?

Providing an architecture diagram is mandatory so that both the cloud team and the requester can understand the deployment demand and overview of what needs to be deployed. The diagram should include all services to be deployed, interactions, network layout, and additional information for clarity.
I am a helpful assistant.
What are the drawbacks of manually configuring infrastructure via the Azure portal website?

Manually configuring infrastructure has drawbacks such as requiring manual interaction for every change, inability to be automated for similar services, and difficulty in rebuilding the infrastructure.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and how is it implemented at Henkel?

Infrastructure as Code (IaC) is an approach where infrastructure is described in a configuration file, allowing for automation of infrastructure setup and maintenance. At Henkel, Hashicorp's Terraform is used as the IaC solution to ensure maintainable infrastructure deployment.
I am a helpful assistant.
What are the steps to deploy infrastructure using Terraform?

The steps to deploy infrastructure using Terraform are first defining infrastructure in a configuration file, then running the command terraform plan to validate the configuration and generate a list of changes, and finally running the command terraform apply to provision the described changes.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is Azure DevOps and how is it used in development projects?

Azure DevOps is a tool from Microsoft used for storing source code, building pipelines, managing work with boards and backlogs, and deploying applications via pipelines. It can be requested to create Azure DevOps projects along with Service Connections for infrastructure deployment.
I am a helpful assistant.
What should be prioritized in Cloud architecture - container based compute design or integrated PaaS solutions?
Container based compute design should be prioritized over an integrated PaaS solution.
I am a helpful assistant.
How should Storage Services like CosmosDB be used?
Storage Services like CosmosDB should be used with interoperable protocols if available, such as CosmosDB with MongoAPI / SQL.
I am a helpful assistant.
Which Azure services are to be weighted higher than others?
Azure SQL with Postgres and MariaDB is to be weighted higher than Azure SQL.
I am a helpful assistant.
What should be used for Private Endpoint usage and Vnet/PVC integrated designs in Cloud project integration guardrails?
Private Endpoint usage and Vnet/PVC integrated designs should be used for PaaS request VNet.
I am a helpful assistant.
How should Azure Infrastructure be automated?
Azure Infrastructure should be automated via Terraform Infrastructure as Code guidelines.
I am a helpful assistant.
How should security controls be aligned in Cloud architecture?
Security controls must be aligned with the Security Checklist at any time.
I am a helpful assistant.
How should new demands and projects towards Cloud at Henkel be announced?
New demands and projects towards Cloud at Henkel are to be announced via the Cloud Portal.
I am a helpful assistant.
What should be done first when requesting a new Catalog Item?
Follow the instruction in Cloud Portal until Step 1.4 of the "Generic Ticket Flow".
I am a helpful assistant.
What information should be entered when requesting a new Catalog Item?
Enter general information as well as Application Information in the designated fields.
I am a helpful assistant.
How can you enter the tickets detail view in "Draft" state?
Click "Create Request".
I am a helpful assistant.
Where can you find pre-defined catalog items when entering the Detail view?
Under the "Catalog Resource" dropdown that appears in the right center of the Ticket.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is recommended for those not familiar with the Henkel Cloud Platforms?
Consider deploying a Sandbox initially.
I am a helpful assistant.
How can one request sandboxes?
Select "Azure Landing Zone" in the catalog offers drop-down box and select "sdbx" under the "Stage" drop-down.
I am a helpful assistant.
What types of Child Tickets can be opened once the ticket state turns into Base- or BizDevOps maintenance?
ChangeCharging, AddCatalogItem, Add Generic Service
I am a helpful assistant.
What does the ChangeCharging ticket type do?
Changes the Clarity order of running Cloud resources
I am a helpful assistant.
What does the AddCatalogItem ticket type do?
Adds Cloud resources to existing Resourcing as Sub items
I am a helpful assistant.
What does the Add Generic Service ticket type do?
Adds Managed Services such as Custom Maintenance to the resources.
I am a helpful assistant.
Do I need to use the portal for all new demands such as T&M Requests to Skaylink / IQ3 Cloud?
Yes. All commercial demands to the Skaylink Business Entity must go via Hybrid Cloud Portal regardless it is a T&M commission or a Azure resource request. So no extra Ariba commission at this time.
I am a helpful assistant.
Shall I request changes on my existing Azure resources via Hybrid Cloud Portal?

No, as of now Incident Tracking and Service requests (request which will not end up in a new Cloud resource) are still routed via support@iq3Cloud.com. This is the case for a Azure role assignment or changing the configuration of an Azure Subscription as such. In other cases IQ3 Cloud informs you to start a new demands if needed. Read further Cloud Service Details
I am a helpful assistant.
How to report Bugs and recommendations?
Via MS teams "Hybrid Cloud Community" or at cloud@henkel.com.
I am a helpful assistant.
What are the important roles for success when implementing solutions by the project team themselves?

The Cloud Platform or Service Delivery team require cloud-experienced personas to collaborate profoundly with roles such as IT Project Manager/Product Owner, Solution Engineer, Architects, and Cloud and DevOps Engineers.
I am a helpful assistant.
What responsibilities does the IT Project Manager/Product Owner have in a cloud project?

The IT Project Manager/Product Owner takes care of overall/end-to-end project responsibility by knowing both Technical and Business areas, communication, and coordination with required stakeholders, including the Cloud Architecture team at different project phases.
I am a helpful assistant.
What are the responsibilities of Solution Engineers and Architects in a cloud project?

Solution Engineers and Architects are responsible for Cloud Infrastructure design & DevOps strategy definition by incorporating set practices and guidelines by the Cloud Architecture Team. They are usually the technical leads in the team.
I am a helpful assistant.
What tasks are performed by Cloud and DevOps Engineers in a cloud project?

Cloud and DevOps Engineers are responsible for building and configuring required Cloud services, automating deployments, configuring DevOps tools software packages, defining detailed cloud service designs, implementing cloud architectures in infrastructure-as-code, automating deployments, revising IaC templates, and applying engineering practices such as testing, evaluation, and monitoring.
I am a helpful assistant.
How do I open incidents or report exceptions to IQ3 Cloud?
You can open incidents or report exceptions to IQ3 Cloud via support@iq3cloud.com.
I am a helpful assistant.
How can I reach the IQ3 Cloud team in case of issues?

Response time by IQ3 Cloud is usually within 2-4 hours, and cloud incident handling is provided in CET business hours with a 24-hour emergency hotline if requested. You can also track and channel incidents via support@iq3cloud.com.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the response time for handling incidents by IQ3 Cloud?
The response time by IQ3 Cloud is usually within 2-4 hours, based on best efforts.
I am a helpful assistant.
What should be done if there is no maintenance contract or standard cloud service agreement?
If no maintenance contract or standard cloud service agreement exists, you should raise a demand via the Hybrid Cloud Portal.
I am a helpful assistant.
How can incidents be opened for Azure support?
Basic Support Tickets should be opened in ServiceNow and channeled to Accenture Azure AD team for Azure support.
I am a helpful assistant.
What are the responsibilities of IQ3 Cloud and Henkel in the managed cloud service?

Responsibilities include managing subscriptions, tickets, charging, communication, security center advisories, service principals, account control, monitoring, network management, KeyVault, VMs, and Azure SQL databases, depending on the service and service model commissioned.
I am a helpful assistant.
What happens if no maintenance contract or standard cloud service agreement exists?
If no maintenance contract or standard cloud service agreement exists, a demand should be raised via the Hybrid Cloud Portal.
I am a helpful assistant.
How is the charging managed for resources on Azure within the managed cloud service?
All resources on Azure are charged based on the Microsoft EA contract with Henkel, and these costs are charged out/back to the consuming unit, which is managed by Solutions direkt GmbH.
I am a helpful assistant.
How should incidents related to network access be handled?
Network access incidents should be managed by Solutions direkt GmbH, with monitoring and evaluation based on Azure log information.
I am a helpful assistant.
What should be done for networking tasks like managing Vnet, subnets, firewall rules, and peering?
Tasks for managing Vnet, subnets, firewall rules, and peering should be performed by Solutions direkt GmbH and can be automated via the IQ3 CLOUD Self Service Portal.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is your driver to go into Cloud?
Be aware that DC&Cloud team may reject your case and redirect you into another deployment.
I am a helpful assistant.
Please provide an initial architecture diagram of your proposed solution.
(Answer in diagram format provided by the project)
I am a helpful assistant.
Please list all the components that need to be installed and its hardware requirements.
(List of components and hardware requirements provided)
I am a helpful assistant.
Which frameworks do you use?
(Specify frameworks used by the project)
I am a helpful assistant.
Which programming language does the solution use?
(Specify programming language used)
I am a helpful assistant.
Are you able to containerize the application? Can the application work stateless?
(Information regarding containerization and statelessness provided)
I am a helpful assistant.
How many users will access your solution?
(Specify the number of users)
I am a helpful assistant.
Do you foresee any spikes?
(Comment on any expected spikes)
I am a helpful assistant.
What should be prioritized over an integrated PaaS solution in container-based compute design?
Container on an Azure App service over a Python Function App.
I am a helpful assistant.
Which storage services should be used with interoperable protocols?
CosmosDB with MongoAPI/SQL, if available.
I am a helpful assistant.
What databases should be weighted higher than Azure SQL?
Azure SQL with Postgres and MariaDB.
I am a helpful assistant.
What guardrails should be followed for PaaS requests in Cloud project integration?
Private Endpoint usage and Vnet/PVC integrated designs should be used.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is mandatory for tst/qua/prd stages in Cloud project integration?
VNet provisioning is to be requested by Skaylink IQ3 Request Vnet | Use TF Module Vnet.
I am a helpful assistant.
How should Azure infrastructure be automated?
Automated via Terraform Infrastructure as Code Guideline of Terraform Development.
I am a helpful assistant.
When should security controls be aligned with the Security Checklist?
Security controls must be aligned with the Security Checklist at any time.
I am a helpful assistant.
How are new demands and projects towards Cloud at Henkel announced?
New demands and projects towards Cloud at Henkel are to be announced via Cloud Portal | Get Started.
I am a helpful assistant.
How should larger Changes and additions to Cloud projects be handled?
Larger Changes and additions must be proven or announced via a change in Cloud Portal | Get Started.
I am a helpful assistant.
Why and when did the IT industry see a major boom in Cloud Computing adoption?
The IT industry saw a major boom in Cloud Computing adoption over the last decade, as major Cloud providers have proven their focus on IT security and infrastructure, gaining customer confidence.
I am a helpful assistant.
What are some good cases for Public Cloud usage according to the document?

Some good cases for Public Cloud usage include customer-facing public applications, applications leveraging modern interface technologies, applications replaceable by Software-as-a-Service, and systems with high peaks or massive computation requirements.
I am a helpful assistant.
In what cases is Private Cloud or Data Center usage recommended?

Private Cloud or Data Center usage is recommended for applications with critical interfaces to other on-premise applications, applications that do not need external access, applications reliant on older technologies, and applications with highly sensitive data.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the preferred Cloud provider starting from July 2022 for generic workloads?
Starting from July 2022, Google Cloud is favored over Microsoft Azure for generic workloads, but this does not apply to BI and HDP-based workloads.
I am a helpful assistant.
Where should Kubernetes workloads be placed according to the document?
Kubernetes workloads should be placed into OpenShift in the Private Cloud.
I am a helpful assistant.
Do I need to use the portal for all new demands such as T&M Requests to Skaylink / IQ3 Cloud?
Yes. All commercial demands to the Skaylink Business Entity must go via Hybrid Cloud Portal regardless it is a T&M commission or a Azure resource request. So no extra Ariba commission at this time.
I am a helpful assistant.
Shall I request changes on my existing Azure resources via Hybrid Cloud Portal?

No, as of now Incident Tracking and Service requests (request which will not end up in a new Cloud resource) are still routed via support@iq3Cloud.com. This is the case for an Azure role assignment or changing the configuration of an Azure Subscription as such. In other cases IQ3 Cloud informs you to start a new demands if needed. Read further Cloud Service Details
I am a helpful assistant.
How to report Bugs and recommendations?
Via MS teams "Hybrid Cloud Community" or at cloud@henkel.com
I am a helpful assistant.
What role does the IT Project Manager/Product Owner play in a cloud project?
The IT Project Manager/Product Owner takes care of overall project responsibility, communication, and coordination with stakeholders, including the Cloud Architecture team.
I am a helpful assistant.
What are the responsibilities of Solution Engineers and Architects in a cloud project?

Solution Engineers and Architects are responsible for designing cloud infrastructure, defining DevOps strategies, and incorporating set practices and guidelines provided by the Cloud Architecture Team.
I am a helpful assistant.
What tasks are typically performed by Cloud and DevOps Engineers in a cloud project?

Cloud and DevOps Engineers are responsible for building and configuring cloud services, automating deployments, configuring DevOps tools, and ensuring that cloud service designs meet security standards and best practices.
I am a helpful assistant.
What are the roles defined in the Cloud Landing Zone Governance document?
The roles addressed in the document are mainly referred to as "the user" or "owner," with synonyms including Asset Owner, Subscription Owner, Product manager, Application manager, and Tenant user.
I am a helpful assistant.
What are the key pillars of Cloud Governance mentioned in the document?
The key pillars of Cloud Governance mentioned in the document are Security, Identity, Agility, Consistency, and Cost.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the recommended approach to handle security and compliance in cloud applications according to the document?

The document suggests implementing at least the same security and compliance levels for cloud applications as those hosted on-premises. A defense-in-depth approach is mandatory, and unmanaged sandbox environments should not contain sensitive data.
I am a helpful assistant.
How is Identity and Access Management (IAM) addressed in the document?

The document emphasizes the importance of a well-designed IAM in cloud environments. It specifies the use of a centralized identity solution, role-based access model, multi-factor authentication, and privileged access management techniques.
I am a helpful assistant.
How does the document recommend handling infrastructure protection in cloud environments?

The document recommends hardening compute instances, using approved OS images, implementing vulnerability and patch management processes, and protecting compute instances with anti-malware technology.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the document's stance on application security in cloud environments?

The document stresses the importance of secure coding practices, static and dynamic application security testing, and infrastructure as code security. It also mentions the need for regular code dependency checks and container scanning solutions.
I am a helpful assistant.
How does the document suggest implementing detection mechanisms in cloud environments for early reaction to security issues?

The document recommends activating CSP security centers or hubs, configuring them according to best practices, and maintaining a logging concept for monitoring user and administrative activities. It also involves assigning responsibility for continuous monitoring and evaluation of security findings.
I am a helpful assistant.
What steps are suggested regarding the management of administrative access in the document?

Steps include enabling multi-factor authentication for administrative accounts, using privileged access management techniques like Azure PIM, assigning roles to groups instead of individual users, and logging and alerting on changes to administrative group membership.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is Henkel Managed Cloud?
Henkel Managed Cloud (HMC) is the product of the Henkel's DC & Cloud Architecture Team and serves as the foundation for all public cloud based offerings in an enterprise context at Henkel.
I am a helpful assistant.
What does Henkel Managed Cloud Platform offer?
Henkel Managed Cloud Platform offers a secure environment for placing cloud workloads to leverage hyperscaling technologies and elasticity for various use cases.
I am a helpful assistant.
Who is responsible for running Henkel Managed Cloud v.1?
Henkel Managed Cloud v.1 is run by the external Provider Skaylink and its IQ3 Cloud.
I am a helpful assistant.
What feature of Azure Backup vault is not supported?
Vaulted backup (preview) is not supported.
I am a helpful assistant.
What can Azure Backup vault be used for due to concerns with Henkel Security policies?
Azure Backup vault can only be used for Operational backups.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the minimum required configuration for Azure Backup vault?

The minimum required configuration includes: enabling system managed identity, enabling soft delete with at least 14 days retention, enabling built-in alerts for failed backups and restores, enabling immutable vault and locking it, and disabling cross subscription restore.
I am a helpful assistant.
What Terraform provider is used in the provided example for Azure Backup vault configuration?
AzApi Terraform Provider is used due to limitations in configuration options with the AzureRM provider at the time of documentation writing.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the minimum required configuration for Azure Container Registry?

The minimum required configuration includes using the Premium SKU to support private endpoints, enabling private endpoints, disabling public network access, disabling anonymous authentication, disabling the local admin account, enabling Microsoft Defender for Containers, resolving vulnerability findings in Defender Recommendations, and configuring diagnostic settings with audit logs to Log Analytics Workspace.
I am a helpful assistant.
What enforcement policies should be applied for Azure Container Registry?
The document suggests displaying Azure policies specific to Azure Container Registry (ACR).
I am a helpful assistant.
Is there a Terraform example provided for Azure Container Registry configuration?
Yes, a Terraform example is provided in the document for configuring Azure Container Registry, specified in a file named "container_registry.tf".
I am a helpful assistant.
Can resources in a vnet publish events to a System Topic?
Yes, if they have the correct permissions.
I am a helpful assistant.
Can a System Topic deliver events to resources inside a VNet if they are locked down for public access?
No, it cannot deliver events to resources with public access disallowed.
I am a helpful assistant.
How can an exception for public access be made to allow delivery of events from a System Topic to a specific service?
By allowing the specific service as an exception for public access using the namespace and id of the service.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is disallowed by policies when making exceptions for specific services?
Making exceptions for specific services is disallowed by policies.
I am a helpful assistant.
How can one be allowed to make exceptions for specific services for public access in the System Topic?
By contacting security to request permission to do so.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the minimum required configuration mentioned for Azure Event Grid - System Topic?
Enabling system managed identity.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the Terraform example provided in the document?
terraform linenums="1"
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the minimum required configuration for Azure IoT Hub?

The minimum required configuration includes using Private Endpoint for inbound communication, disabling public network access by default, ensuring IoT devices support TLS 1.2 communication, using System-assigned identity to access other resources, enabling Defender for IoT integration, using Identity-based authentication for Service APIs, and X.509 certificate-based authentication for devices.
I am a helpful assistant.
What authentication method should be used for Service APIs with Azure IoT Hub?
Identity-based authentication should be used for Service APIs, and authentication using Shared Access Key should be disabled.
I am a helpful assistant.
What authentication method should be used for devices with Azure IoT Hub?
X.509 certificate-based authentication should be used for devices, and authentication using SAS tokens should be disabled.
I am a helpful assistant.
What are the minimum required configurations for the Load Testing Service?
There are no minimum requirements for the Load Testing Service.
I am a helpful assistant.
What recommendations are provided for using secrets in the Load Tests?
It is suggested not to insert secrets directly into the Load Tests as clear text. Instead, use Azure KeyVault to store secrets.
I am a helpful assistant.
Are there RBAC roles available for Data Plane operations in the Load Testing Service?
Yes, the Load Testing Service has RBAC roles such as "Load Test Reader" and "Load Test Contributor" that should only be granted to identities requiring actions on the Load Tests.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the minimum Redis version that should be used with Azure Cache for Redis?
Redis version 6.0 should be used.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the minimum TLS version requirement for Azure Cache for Redis?
The minimum TLS version should be set to 1.2.
I am a helpful assistant.
Should non-SSL ports be enabled for Azure Cache for Redis?
No, non-SSL ports should not be enabled.
I am a helpful assistant.
How should the resource preferably be connected for Azure Cache for Redis?
The resource should preferably be vNET injected, at least have a private endpoint.
I am a helpful assistant.
Should public network access be enabled for Azure Cache for Redis?
No, public network access should be disabled.
I am a helpful assistant.
What authentication method should be used with Azure Cache for Redis?
Active directory authentication should be enabled.
I am a helpful assistant.
What kind of managed identity should be used for outbound connectivity to other services with Azure Cache for Redis?
System-assigned managed identity should be used.
I am a helpful assistant.
When should managedIdentity be set as the preferred data persistence authentication method with Azure Cache for Redis?
managedIdentity should be set as the preferred data persistence authentication method if either AOF or RDB backup is enabled.
I am a helpful assistant.
How is inbound traffic to a Cache for Redis redirected?
Inbound traffic to a Cache for Redis is through a Private Endpoint.
I am a helpful assistant.
What kind of policies can be enforced for Azure Cache for Redis?
Enforced policies can be displayed using specific Azure policies, as indicated in the document.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the name of the resource group being created?
The name of the resource group being created is specified by the variable `var.resource_group_name`.
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the name of the CDN frontdoor profile being created?
The name of the CDN frontdoor profile being created is "${local.prefix}adf".
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the SKU name of the CDN frontdoor profile being created?
The SKU name of the CDN frontdoor profile being created is "Premium_AzureFrontDoor".
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the name of the CDN frontdoor endpoint being created?
The name of the CDN frontdoor endpoint being created is "${local.prefix}endpoint".
I am a helpful assistant.
What is the mode of the CDN frontdoor firewall policy being created?
The mode of the CDN frontdoor firewall policy being created is "Prevention".
